title: UNHRC Investigation on Sri Lanka – Revisiting Ban Ki Moons Panel of Expert Report
content: The OHCHR investigation against Sri Lanka led by outgoing UN chief Navi Pillay will attempt to use the platform given to reinforce the dubious, contradictory and controversial reports that have been compiled against Sri Lanka.
